name: Misadventures In Tanoshii
description:
After the Princess, Sarah, leaves Tanoshii to Earth, there are a lot of questions from all her friends on what to do while she's gone, as well as what has happened when she and one-time-enemy Blade returned with smiles on their faces after disappearing for a week. What happens? Will everyone get along?

Features:

Digitally painted backgrounds.

Multiple short stories over the span of a few months.

Two endings.

Familiar characters, new point of view!
